name: Earth Archives: "Sports Game"
description:
Greetings fellow Earth enthusiasts!

We have uncovered archives of a particular "game" played by the long forgotten "Humans", the "game" in question is called: "Sports".

We have utilized the documentation we have accumulated, and constructed a primitive display of the cruel and outlandish pass time known as "Sports Game".

This, then - is now being provided through the use of the previously popular "Human Intergoogles". Such fascinating beings.
